construct:Cogwheel.NAME: Cogwheel
construct:Cogwheel.FLAVOR: A piece of old machinery, carefully preserved.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yArtifact at the start of each combat.

construct:MasterCore.NAME: Master Core
construct:MasterCore.FLAVOR: A core stolen from one of the Guardians. Summons other cores to your aid.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 random #yCores into your draw pile.

construct:ClockworkPhoenix.NAME: Clockwork Phoenix
construct:ClockworkPhoenix.FLAVOR: An artificial being designed to imitate the real thing. Amazingly lifelike.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yupgraded Construct cards can now be #yMega-upgraded outside of combat.

construct:ClawGrip.NAME: Claw Grip
construct:ClawGrip.FLAVOR: An extendable arm used to grab hard-to-reach objects.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, #yRetain a random card. It costs #b1 less [E] next turn.

construct:FoamFinger.NAME: Foam Finger
construct:FoamFinger.FLAVOR: Always useful when you need a helping hand.
DESCRIPTIONS: For the first #b3 turns of each combat, draw #b1 additional card at the start of your turn.

construct:MegaBattery.NAME: Mega Battery
construct:MegaBattery.FLAVOR: Developed by gremlin inventors in an attempt to create a self-aware robot. It did not go well.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #yMega-upgrade a random Construct card.

construct:RocketBooster.NAME: Rocket Booster
construct:RocketBooster.FLAVOR: It doesn't matter how weak your swing is when you're moving at 200 miles per hour.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you defeat an Elite, #yUpgrade a random card.

construct:PurpleEmber.NAME: Purple Ember
construct:PurpleEmber.FLAVOR: A ghostly, flickering flame. It seems to absorb the power of nearby fires.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter a Rest Site, your starting hand next combat is #yMega-upgraded until the end of combat.

construct:WeddingRing.NAME: Wedding Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 2 cards. Once per turn, after you play one of them, play the other one too.

construct:IceCubes.NAME: Ice Cubes
DESCRIPTIONS: Your cards cannot [#ff9900]Overheat for the first #b3 turns of combat.

construct:BoolHorns.NAME: Bool Horns
construct:BoolHorns.FLAVOR: Horns from a rarely-seen species. Bools are known to only show aggression towards those who speak lies.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, deal #b
damage to a random enemy. Upon entering a non-combat space, double the damage this relic deals next combat.

construct:LongRangeLance.NAME: Long-Range Lance
construct:LongRangeLance.FLAVOR: You hit exactly what you aimed at.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next combat, deal #b
damage to a random enemy, then lose this relic.

construct:ExtraLongRangeLance.NAME: EXTRA-Long-Range Lance
construct:ExtraLongRangeLance.FLAVOR: Okay, you just launched this one randomly. But it's bound to hit something!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the combat after the next one, deal #b
damage to a random enemy, then lose this relic.

construct:Challenge1.NAME: Challenger's Mark 1
construct:Challenge1.FLAVOR: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

construct:Challenge2.NAME: Challenger's Mark 2
construct:Challenge2.FLAVOR: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

construct:Challenge3.NAME: Challenger's Mark 3
construct:Challenge3.FLAVOR: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

construct:Challenge4.NAME: Challenger's Mark 4
construct:Challenge4.FLAVOR: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

construct:Challenge5.NAME: Challenger's Mark 5
construct:Challenge5.FLAVOR: The mark of one who chooses to undertake the Spire's toughest challenges.

construct:FreezeFrame.NAME: Freeze Frame
construct:FreezeFrame.FLAVOR: This wooden picture frame is impossibly cold to the touch.
DESCRIPTIONS: Right-click to activate or deactivate. While active, cards do not Cycle when drawn.

construct:Bumper.NAME: Bumper
DESCRIPTIONS: When a card would deal damage to you, it deals that damage to a random enemy instead.

construct:Photocopier.NAME: Photocopier
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a non-Rare card each combat, shuffle 2 copies of that card into your draw pile.
